4313860.name: Contención: Psiquiátrico
4313860.description:
Face the paranormal in this survival horror experience. Monitor surveillance cameras, identify entities using professional equipment, and maintain the stability of an abandoned psychiatric hospital before your sanity runs out.

Short Description

Containment: Psychiatric is a survival horror experience where you take the night shift as a field investigator inside an abandoned psychiatric hospital. Your task is simple in theory: monitor the cameras, identify spectral entities, and keep the system stable before your sanity collapses.

Will you make it to dawn… or become another patient of the shadows?

Long Description

The Shift That Changes Everything

Welcome to your new job.
As a field investigator, you have been assigned to one of the most unstable facilities in the sector. Your office is small, your responsibility enormous. You are not here just to watch screens. You are here to contain what others failed to control.

Identification & Survival

Use a full set of professional tools including EMF readers, spirit communication devices, and night-vision cameras to collect evidence and classify the entity lurking in the dark.

Containment Technology

The GH-OS IDENTIFIER v1.0 is your lifeline. Manage battery power, repair system failures, and activate the Ecto-Fluid Stabilizer (EEC) to suppress paranormal activity.
But be careful: critical pressure levels and the slow collapse of your sanity are just as dangerous as the entities themselves.

Key Features

Investigation Gameplay

Collect up to three types of evidence (footprints, orbs, freezing temperatures, and more) to identify over 20 unique entities, each with its own behavior and threat profile.

Resource Management

Carefully control battery usage, night vision, and ultraviolet light while maintaining the integrity of the EEC system.

Multiple Game Modes

Story Mode
Survive a series of escalating nights, guided by in-game calls and tutorial support.

Extreme Challenges
Test your limits in Nightmare and Scarcity modes, built for experienced investigators.

Survival Mode
How long can you last before the shadows claim you?

Progression System

Earn credits for your services in “Spectral Exorcism & Cleanup.”
Spend your paychecks in the in-game Shop to unlock new rooms, upgrades, and collectibles.

Deeply Immersive Atmosphere

A haunting soundscape and a dedicated retro-terminal interface place you inside a real containment operation.

Available Equipment

  • Surveillance Monitor: Access 8 strategically placed cameras.

  • Data Terminal: Transmit evidence in real time.

  • UV Light & Night Vision: Reveal what the human eye cannot see.

  • Field Tools: Essential instruments for investigation and survival.
